quotes.text: You are not your thoughts. You are the observer of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.text: This too shall pass.
quotes.author: Persian Proverb

quotes.text: Be gentle with yourself. You're doing the best you can.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax.
quotes.author: Mark Black

quotes.text: Feelings are just visitors. Let them come and go.
quotes.author: Mooji

quotes.text: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.text: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Nothing can harm you as much as your own thoughts unguarded.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Talk to yourself like you would to someone you love.
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.text: Worrying does not empty tomorrow of its troubles. It empties today of its strength.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.text: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.text: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world throws at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Anxiety is love's greatest killer. It makes others feel as you might when a drowning man holds on to you.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: You are the sky. Everything else is just the weather.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: Nothing ever goes away until it teaches us what we need to know.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most fundamental aggression to ourselves is to not remain true to ourselves.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.text: Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's okay to not be okay, as long as you are not giving up.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.text: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: There is a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.text: When you can't control what's happening, challenge yourself to control the way you respond.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: One small crack does not mean that you are broken, it means that you were put to the test and you didn't fall apart.
quotes.author: Linda Poindexter

quotes.text: You don't have to be positive all the time. It's perfectly okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, frustrated, scared and anxious.
quotes.author: Lori Deschene

quotes.text: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.text: Self-care is how you take your power back.
quotes.author: Lalah Delia

quotes.text: You owe yourself the love that you so freely give to other people.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Be patient with yourself. Self-growth is tender; it's holy ground. There's no greater investment.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: Sometimes you need to step outside, get some air, and remind yourself of who you are and where you want to be.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Stars can't shine without darkness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
quotes.author: Etty Hillesum

quotes.text: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only way out is through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem.
quotes.author: Christopher Robin

quotes.text: Calmness is the cradle of power.
quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.text: You don't have to be perfect to be amazing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Healing doesn't mean the damage never existed. It means the damage no longer controls our lives.
quotes.author: Akshay Dubey

quotes.text: Sometimes you just need to slow down, take a deep breath, and remind yourself: I am human, and that's okay.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You are enough just as you are.
quotes.author: Meghan Markle

quotes.text: You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami
quotes.source: What I Talk About When I Talk About Running

quotes.text: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: In the midst of winter, I found there was, within me, an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: You are allowed to be both a masterpiece and a work in progress simultaneously.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.text: What you seek is seeking you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Wherever you are, be all there.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.text: Be kind to yourself. We often need the kindness the most when we feel we deserve it the least.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your heart knows the way. Run in that direction.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Sometimes letting things go is an act of far greater power than defending or hanging on.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Inner peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person or event to control your emotions.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: You don't have to justify your feelings. They exist. And they're valid.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Sometimes you have to disconnect to stay connected. Remember the old days when you had eye contact during a conversation?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.text: Be the love you never received.
quotes.author: Rune Lazuli

quotes.text: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Ride the energy of your own unique spirit.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.text: You have been assigned this mountain to show others it can be moved.
quotes.author: Mel Robbins

quotes.text: Do not judge me by my successes, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Sometimes we need to take a break from everyone and everything to find out who we are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.text: Sometimes our light goes out but is blown into flame by another human being. Each of us owes deepest thanks to those who have rekindled this light.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: Breathe. You're going to be okay. Breathe and remember that you've been in this place before. You've been this uncomfortable and anxious and scared, and you've survived.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell
quotes.source: The Hero with a Thousand Faces

quotes.text: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.text: Don't be afraid of your fears. They're not there to scare you. They're there to let you know that something is worth it.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.text: The only thing that makes life possible is permanent, intolerable uncertainty; not knowing what comes next.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.text: You're not a mess. You're brave for trying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.text: Your journey has molded you for your greater good, and it was exactly what it needed to be.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes you need those bad days to help you appreciate the good ones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's okay to live a life others don't understand.
quotes.author: Jenna Woginrich

quotes.text: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn
quotes.source: Wherever You Go, There You Are

quotes.text: Trust the timing of your life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You are not required to set yourself on fire to keep other people warm.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Give yourself the same care and attention that you give to others and watch yourself bloom.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.text: Just because no one else can heal or do your inner work for you doesn't mean you can, should, or need to do it alone.
quotes.author: Lisa Olivera

quotes.text: Your value doesn't decrease based on someone's inability to see your worth.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Recovery is not a race. You don't have to feel guilty if it takes you longer than you thought it would.
quotes.author: Unknown
